about_the_game: Discover the amazing additional content available to you on the Steam page! Explore stunning artwork, fascinating photos and designs, immerse yourself in immersive music, and choose a unique profile picture to show off your personality to other players. Enrich your gaming experience with these amazing visual and audio elements, making every moment even more captivating for you.
detailed_description: Discover the amazing additional content available to you on the Steam page! Explore stunning artwork, fascinating photos and designs, immerse yourself in immersive music, and choose a unique profile picture to show off your personality to other players. Enrich your gaming experience with these amazing visual and audio elements, making every moment even more captivating for you.
